meanings.definition: A person suffering from anorexia nervosa.
meanings.sent1: Anorexics often struggle with body image issues.
meanings.sent2: The support group was filled with anorexics sharing their stories.
meanings.sent3: The anorexics at the party only picked at their food, making everyone else feel guilty for eating.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with being thin turned her into an anorexic, starving herself for days.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the daily struggles of anorexics trying to recover.

meanings.sent1: The clinic specialized in treating anorexics with personalized care.
meanings.sent2: The anorexics in the study showed similar patterns of behavior.
meanings.sent3: The group of anorexics decided to start a book club to distract themselves from their disorder.
meanings.sent4: The anorexics in the room seemed to form an unspoken bond, understanding each other's struggles.
meanings.sent5: The fashion industry often glorifies anorexics, promoting unhealthy body standards.
